allow:
Bash(# Configure window using AppleScript
osascript <<'APPLESCRIPT'
tell application "Finder"
    tell disk "AppleMLXTutorials"
        open
        set current view of container window to icon view
        set toolbar visible of container window to false
        set statusbar visible of container window to false
        set the bounds of container window to {400, 100, 940, 480}
        set viewOptions to the icon view options of container window
        set arrangement of viewOptions to not arranged
        set icon size of viewOptions to 128
        set position of item "AppleMLXTutorials.app" of container window to {130, 170}
        set position of item "Applications" of container window to {410, 170}
        close
        open
        update without registering applications
        delay 1
        close
    end tell
end tell
APPLESCRIPT)
Bash(# Eject all AppleMLXTutorials disks for disk in disk18 disk19 disk20 disk21 disk22 disk23; do hdiutil detach $disk -force done echo ""All disks ejected"" # Check ls /Volumes/)
